General.Name: Xinxiang Chemical Fiber Co Ltd
General.Description: Xinxiang Chemical Fiber Co., Ltd. produces and sells chemical fiber products in China. Its products include biomass cellulose filaments that are used in medical and industrial fields. The company offers spandex fibers comprising of heat resistance, antibacterial, coloring, and softness related products. It also exports its products to India, Pakistan, Turkey, Italy and internationally. Xinxiang Chemical Fiber Co., Ltd. company was founded in 1993 and is based in Xinxiang, China.
General.Address: South Side Of Xinchang Road, Xinxiang, China, 453000
